maqras.text: antatah hamane use is dasha mein ki vah nidhaal tha, saaf maidaan mein daal diya.
hamane usapar beladaar vrksh ugaaya tha
aur hamane use ek laakh ya usase adhik (logon) kee or bheja
phir ve eemaan lae to hamane unhen ek avadhi kar sukh bhogane ka avasar diya.
ab unase poochho, "kya tumhaare rab ke lie to betiyaan hon aur unake apane lie bete
kya hamane farishton ko auraten banaaya aur yah unakee aankhon dekhee baat hain
sun lo, nishchay hee ve apanee managhadant kahate hai
ki "allaah ke aulaad huee hai!" nishchay hee ve jhoothe hai.
kya usane beton kee apeksha betiyaan chun lee hai
tumhen kya ho gaya hai? tum kaisa faisala karate ho
to kya tum hosh se kaam nahin lete
kya tumhaare paas koee spasht pramaan hai
to lao apanee kitaab, yadi tum sachche ho
unhonne allaah aur jinnon ke beech naata jod rakha hai, haalaanki jinnon ko bhalee-bhaanti maaloom hai ki ve avashy pakadakar haazir kie jaenge
mahaan aur uchch hai allaah usase, jo ve bayaan karate hai.
allaah ke un bandon kee baat aur hai, jinhen usane chun liya
atah tum aur jinako tum poojate ho ve
tum sab allaah ke viruddh kisee ko bahaka nahin sakate
sivaay usake jo jahannam kee bhadakatee aag mein padane hee vaala ho
aur hamaaree or se usake lie anivaaryatah ek gyaat aur niyat sthaan hai
aur ham hee panktibaddh karate hai.
aur ham hee mahaanata bayaan karate hai
ve to kaha karate the
yadi hamaare paas pichhalon kee koee shiksha hotee
to ham allaah ke chune hue bande hote.
kintu unhonne inakaar kar diya, to ab jald hee ve jaan lenge
aur hamaare apane un bandon ke haq mein, jo rasool banaakar bheje gae, hamaaree baat pahale hee nishchit ho chukee hai
ki nishchay hee unheen kee sahaayata kee jaegee.
aur nishchay hee hamaaree sena hee prabhaavee rahegee
atah ek avadhi tak ke lie unase rukh pher lo
aur unhen dekhate raho. ve bhee jald hee (apana parinaam) dekh lenge
kya ve hamaaree yaatana ke lie jaldee macha rahe hain
to jab vah unake aangan mein utaregee to badee hee buree subah hogee un logon kee, jinhen sachet kiya ja chuka hai
ek avadhi tak ke lie unase rukh pher lo
aur dekhate raho, ve jald hee dekh lenge
mahaan aur uchch hai tumhaara rab, prataap ka svaamee, un baaton se jo ve bataate hai
aur salaam hai rasoolon par
aur sab prashansa allaah, saare sansaar ke rab ke lie hai
saad. qasam hai, yaadadihaanee-vaale quraan kee (jisamen koee kamee nahin ki dharmavirodhee saty ko na samajh saken)
balki jinhonne inakaar kiya ve garv aur virodh mein pade hue hai
unase pahale hamane kitanee hee peedhiyon ko vinasht kiya, to ve lage pukaarane. kintu vah samay hatane-bachane ka na tha
unhonne aashchary kiya isapar ki unake paas unheen mein se ek sachetakarta aaya aur inakaar karanevaale kahane lage, "yah jaadoogar hai bada jhootha
kya usane saare upaasyon ko akela ek upaasy thahara diya? nissandeh yah to bahut achambhevaalee cheez hai
aur unake saradaar (yah kahate hue) chal khade hue ki "chalate raho aur apane upaasyon par jamen raho. nissandeh yah vaanchhich cheez hai
yah baat to hamane pichhale dharm mein sunee hee nahin. yah to bas managhadat hai
kya ham sabamen se (chunakar) isee par anusmrti avatarit huee hai?" nahin, balki ve meree anusmrti ke vishay mein sandeh mein hai, balki unhonne abhee tak meree yaatana ka maza chakha hee nahin hai
ya, tere prabhutvashaalee, bade daata rab kee dayaaluta ke khazaane unake paas hai
ya, aakaashon aur dharatee aur jo kuchh unake beech hai, un sabakee baadashaahee unheen kee hai? phir to chaahie ki ve rassiyon dvaara oopar chadh jae
vah ek saadhaaran sena hai (vinasht honevaale) dalon mein se, vahaan maat khaana jisakee niyati hai
unase pahale nooh kee qaum aur aad aur mekhonvaale firaun ne jhuthalaaya
aur samood aur loot kee qaum aur aikaavaale bhee, ye hai ve dal
unamen se pratyek ne rasoolon ko jhuthalaaya, to meree or se dand avashyambhaavee hokar raha
inhen bas ek cheekh kee prateeksha hai jisamen tanik bhee avakaash na hoga
ve kahate hai, "ai hamaare rab! hisaab ke din se pahale hee sheeghr hamaara hissa de de.
ve jo kuchh kahate hai usapar dhairy se kaam lo aur zor va shaktivaale hamaare bande daood ko yaad karo. nishchay hee vah (allaah kee or) bahut rujoo karanevaala tha
hamane parvaton ko usake saath vasheebhoot kar diya tha ki praatahkaal aur sandhy samay tasabeeh karate rahe.
aur pakshiyon ko bhee, jo ekatr ho jaate the. pratyek usake aage rujoo rahata
hamane usaka raajy sudrdh kar diya tha aur use tatvadarshita pradaan kee thee aur nirnaayak baat kahane kee kshamata pradaan kee thee
